amendment.description: To raise taxes by an unprecedented $1.4 trillion for the purpose of fully funding 111 new or expanded federal spending programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4246 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 0 - 97. Record Vote Number: 62.

action.text: Amendment SA 4246 proposed by Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S1966-1972) To raise taxes by an unprecedented $1.4 trillion for the purpose of fully funding 111 new or expanded federal spending programs.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4246 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 0 - 97. Record Vote Number: 62.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4246 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 0 - 97. Record Vote Number: 62.
